Nosotros.Contenido1: We are a festival that promotes the interaction between
Nosotros.ContenidoBold2: FASHION, CINEMA, VISUAL ARTS, MUSIC, TECHNOLOGY and ADVERTISING.
Nosotros.Contenido3: We invite, promote and reward the work of filmmakers, fashion designers, musicians, influencers and brands, in a creative, diverse, inclusive and cultural space.

ElFestival.Texto: In a difficult moment like this one, we want to be more present than ever to support the whole community of artists, filmmakers and fashion designers. For this reason the BAIFFF 2020 edition does not stop and will be held online. We will continue with the work of calling, promoting and rewarding the best professionals in the industry in 12 categories:

Categorias.1: Best Fashion Film National |  International | New Artist
